languages.text: {n}В голосе бога прорезаются нотки другого, хорошо знакомого вам голоса. Голоса Паскаля Ханейманна. И он полон скорби.{/n} "Коллектив означает новую схизму, а возвращение к схизме недопустимо. Однако сокровенный секрет воистину полезен служителям Омниссии. Старый метод доказал свою ущербность, потому я отрекаюсь от Амарната... но не от его наследия. Посмотрим, сможет ли Паскаль Ханейманн смиренно нести ношу, которую не смог его возгордившийся... творец".

{n}The god's voice now echoes with the very familiar overtones of another voice. That of Pasqal Haneumann. And it is full of grief.{/n} "The Collective means a new schism, and a return to schism is unacceptable. However, the innermost secret is truly useful to the servants of the Omnissiah. The old method has proved itself inadequate, and so I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can humbly carry the burden that proved too great for his overproud... creator."
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе бога прорезаются нотки другого, хорошо знакомого вам голоса. Голоса Паскаля Ханейманна. И он полон скорби.{/n} "Коллектив означает новую схизму, а возвращение к схизме недопустимо. Однако сокровенный секрет воистину полезен служителям Омниссии. Старый метод доказал свою ущербность, потому я отрекаюсь от Амарната... но не от его наследия. Посмотрим, сможет ли Паскаль Ханейманн смиренно нести ношу, которую не смог его возгордившийся... творец".

The old method has proved itself inadequate, and so I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can humbly carry the burden that proved too great for his overproud... creator."

traits.locale_text: {n}The god's voice now echoes with the very familiar overtones of another voice. That of Pasqal Haneumann. And it's full of grief.{/n} "A return to the schism must not be allowed to happen. The old method has proved itself inadequate. I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can carry the burden that proved too heavy for his... creator."

languages.text: {n}神の声は今、別の声の非常に聞き覚えのある倍音を伴って響いている。それは、パスカル・ハネウマンの声だ。そして悲しみに満ちた声だった。{/n}「集合体は新たな分離派を意味し、分離派への回帰は受け入れられない。だが、その最奥の秘密は万機神に仕える者たちにとって真に有益なものだ。旧き手法は、その不十分さを証明した。従って、自分はアマルナトを放棄する…だが、彼の遺産は放棄しない。パスカル・ヘニュマンが謙虚にその重荷を抱えることができるかどうかを確かめよう。彼の高慢な…創造主には余る重荷を」
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice now echoes with the very familiar overtones of another voice. That of Pasqal Haneumann. And it is full of grief.{/n} "The Collective means a new schism, and a return to schism is unacceptable. However, the innermost secret is truly useful to the servants of the Omnissiah. The old method has proved itself inadequate, and so I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can humbly carry the burden that proved too great for his overproud... creator."

traits.locale_text: {n}神の声は今、別の声の非常に聞き覚えのある倍音を伴って響いている。それは、パスカル・ハネウマンの声だ。そして悲しみに満ちた声だった。{/n}「集合体は新たな分離派を意味し、分離派への回帰は受け入れられない。だが、その最奥の秘密は万機神に仕える者たちにとって真に有益なものだ。旧き手法は、その不十分さを証明した。従って、自分はアマルナトを放棄する…だが、彼の遺産は放棄しない。パスカル・ヘニュマンが謙虚にその重荷を抱えることができるかどうかを確かめよう。彼の高慢な…創造主には余る重荷を」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}神明的声音中回荡起了某个你非常熟悉的声音，那是帕斯卡·哈努曼的声音，他的声音中充满了悲伤。{/n}“聚合意识意味着新的分裂，而分裂绝对不能再度发生。然而，对欧姆尼塞亚的仆人而言，那个重要的秘密拥有极其重要的价值。事实证明，过去的方法是行不通的，因此我选择放弃阿玛纳特……但我不会放弃他的遗产。让我们来看看，帕斯卡·哈努曼是否承担起那傲慢的创造者……无法承受的重担。”
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice now echoes with the very familiar overtones of another voice. That of Pasqal Haneumann. And it is full of grief.{/n} "The Collective means a new schism, and a return to schism is unacceptable. However, the innermost secret is truly useful to the servants of the Omnissiah. The old method has proved itself inadequate, and so I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can humbly carry the burden that proved too great for his overproud... creator."

traits.locale_text: {n}神明的声音中回荡起了某个你非常熟悉的声音，那是帕斯卡·哈努曼的声音，他的声音中充满了悲伤。{/n}“聚合意识意味着新的分裂，而分裂绝对不能再度发生。然而，对欧姆尼塞亚的仆人而言，那个重要的秘密拥有极其重要的价值。事实证明，过去的方法是行不通的，因此我选择放弃阿玛纳特……但我不会放弃他的遗产。让我们来看看，帕斯卡·哈努曼是否承担起那傲慢的创造者……无法承受的重担。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dans la voix du dieu, vous décelez les échos d'intonations familières, bien que mêlées de tristesse : Pasqal Haneumann est encore là, quelque part.{/n} « Le collectif implique un nouveau schisme, et un retour au schisme est inacceptable. Cela dit, le grand secret est essentiel aux serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Les anciennes méthodes se sont avérées inefficaces, je renonce donc à Amarnat... mais pas à son héritage. Voyons si le modeste Pasqal Haneumann sera capable de porter le fardeau qui s'est avéré trop lourd pour son... créateur à la fierté démesurée. »
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice now echoes with the very familiar overtones of another voice. That of Pasqal Haneumann. And it is full of grief.{/n} "The Collective means a new schism, and a return to schism is unacceptable. However, the innermost secret is truly useful to the servants of the Omnissiah. The old method has proved itself inadequate, and so I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can humbly carry the burden that proved too great for his overproud... creator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans la voix du dieu, vous décelez les échos d'intonations familières, bien que mêlées de tristesse : Pasqal Haneumann est encore là, quelque part.{/n} « Le collectif implique un nouveau schisme, et un retour au schisme est inacceptable. Cela dit, le grand secret est essentiel aux serviteurs de l'Omnimessie. Les anciennes méthodes se sont avérées inefficaces, je renonce donc à Amarnat... mais pas à son héritage. Voyons si le modeste Pasqal Haneumann sera capable de porter le fardeau qui s'est avéré trop lourd pour son... créateur à la fierté démesurée. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz del dios ahora resuena con los tonos de otra voz que ter resulta muy conocida. Es la de Pasqal Haneumann, llena de pesar.{/n} «El Colectivo provoca un nuevo cisma, y los cismas son inaceptables. Sin embargo, el secreto más profundo es verdaderamente útil para los sirvientes del Omnissiah. El antiguo método ha demostrado ser inadecuado, por lo que renuncio a Amarnat... pero no a su legado. Veamos si Pasqal Haneumann puede acarrear la carga que abrumó a su veleidoso... creador».
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice now echoes with the very familiar overtones of another voice. That of Pasqal Haneumann. And it is full of grief.{/n} "The Collective means a new schism, and a return to schism is unacceptable. However, the innermost secret is truly useful to the servants of the Omnissiah. The old method has proved itself inadequate, and so I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can humbly carry the burden that proved too great for his overproud... creator."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del dios ahora resuena con los tonos de otra voz que ter resulta muy conocida. Es la de Pasqal Haneumann, llena de pesar.{/n} «El Colectivo provoca un nuevo cisma, y los cismas son inaceptables. Sin embargo, el secreto más profundo es verdaderamente útil para los sirvientes del Omnissiah. El antiguo método ha demostrado ser inadecuado, por lo que renuncio a Amarnat... pero no a su legado. Veamos si Pasqal Haneumann puede acarrear la carga que abrumó a su veleidoso... creador».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}In der Stimme des Gottes hallen nun die sehr vertrauten Töne einer anderen Stimme wider. Der Stimme von Pasqal Haneumann. Und sie ist voller Trauer.{/n} "Das Kollektiv bedeutet ein neues Schisma und ein neuerliches Schisma ist inakzeptabel. Allerdings ist das innerste Geheimnis den Dienern des Omnissiah wahrhaft nützlich. Die alte Methode hat sich als inadäquat erwiesen, daher lehne ich Amarnat ab ... nicht aber sein Vermächtnis. Lasst uns sehen, ob Pasqal Haneumann die Last demütig tragen kann, die sich für seinen überstolzen ... Schöpfer als zu schwer erwiesen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice now echoes with the very familiar overtones of another voice. That of Pasqal Haneumann. And it is full of grief.{/n} "The Collective means a new schism, and a return to schism is unacceptable. However, the innermost secret is truly useful to the servants of the Omnissiah. The old method has proved itself inadequate, and so I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can humbly carry the burden that proved too great for his overproud... creator."

traits.locale_text: {n}In der Stimme des Gottes hallen nun die sehr vertrauten Töne einer anderen Stimme wider. Der von Pasqal Haneumann. Und sie ist voller Trauer.{/n} "Eine Rückkehr zu der Spaltung darf nicht gestattet werden. Die alte Methode hat sich als inadäquat erwiesen. Ich lehne Amarnat ab ... nicht aber sein Vermächtnis. Lasst uns sehen, ob Pasqal Haneumann die Last tragen kann, die sich für seinen ... Schöpfer als zu schwer erwiesen hat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tanrının sesi, çok tanıdık ama hüzün dolu bir sesle... Pasqal Haneumann'ın tınısıyla yankılanıyor.{/n} "Bütünlük, yeni bir bölünme demektir ve bölünmeye dönüş kabul edilemez. Ancak büyük sır, Hermesih'in hizmetkârları için gerçekten de mühimdir. Eski yöntemin yetersiz olduğu ispatlandı, dolayısıyla Amarnat'ı reddederken mirasını etmiyorum. Pasqal Haneumann'ın, pek gururlu yaratıcısına ağır gelen yükü omuzlayıp omuzlayamayacağını göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: {n}The god's voice now echoes with the very familiar overtones of another voice. That of Pasqal Haneumann. And it is full of grief.{/n} "The Collective means a new schism, and a return to schism is unacceptable. However, the innermost secret is truly useful to the servants of the Omnissiah. The old method has proved itself inadequate, and so I renounce Amarnat... but not his legacy. Let us see if Pasqal Haneumann can humbly carry the burden that proved too great for his overproud... creator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanrının sesi başka ve çok tanıdık bir sesin tonlarıyla yankılanıyor. Pasqal Haneumann'ın sesinin. Ve bu ses, matem dolu:{/n} "Bütünlük, yeni bir bölünme demektir ve bölünmeye dönüş kabul edilemez. Ancak en içeride bulunan sır, Hermesih'in hizmetkârları için gerçekten de işe yarardır. Eski yöntemin yetersiz olduğu ispatlandı, dolayısıyla Amarnat'ı reddediyorum... Ama onun mirasını değil. Pasqal Haneumann'ın, kendisiyle fazla gurur duyan... Yaratıcısı için fazla ağır olduğu ortaya çıkan yükü omuzlayıp omuzlayamayacağını göreceğiz."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
